channel.title: Dicing ruined me,
channel.description: Combat level:84 Armor:Steel Platebody Sword:Dragon dagger Total Coins in bank: 384 Total bank wealth:12k Control your dicing kids, you will always lose when its most important to win.

item.title: Dicing ruined me,
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

tyyy9:

Yes, runescape steals souls, but dicing has released me from that hold, Losing every thing I spent years on doing, gone, and I’m not gonna go back probably, the next time I look on rs it will probably be gone or crap, meaning everything crashed and no one plays it any more.

As I said in another topic, or this one, Runescape is merely a pass time, whom ever that takes it more seriously then a pass time are considered no lifers, whom takes runescape too seriously.

Runescape was one of my favored pass times, now I barely play it, because to me, I only play runescape when I have nothing good to do.

Now one of my favored pass times is doing well in school and playing very well made rsps’.

Haterz will hate my opinions, whilst peple that don’t hate will love my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing ruined me,
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“tyyy9, post:12, topic:413199”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=514669.msg3736461#msg3736461 date=1315000695]
It’s a game, if you are “Ruined” by it thats kinda sad.
[/quote]
Don’t worry, I’m not hopelessly addicted to it like a lot of people, I’ve cheated since level 55 and well, i meant that my “Runescape” is ruined, so yeah, I do have a life just so you know.[/quote]
So your saying RuneScape doesn’t really have a point anymore, yet your posting here that you still play and infact are sad over a loss of a virtual item. You are one nice contradiction sir.

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing ruined me,
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:15, topic:413199”]Lol, I almost lost my entire coin stack… Went from 5mil to 2mil… No joke, I lost a freaking shit load, cause mainly I was getting summoning scammed and getting wep scammed ( the kid would enable summoning or allow use to wield a wep)

Nowadays I’m smarter, I always carry 4 bunyip pouches with me… if I do intent to stake.[/quote]
ohh, I did lose my coin stack, lost about 11m in armor and money.

item.title: Dicing ruined me,
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Frell:

Yes its called plan it so you always make profit. If you have 5m and bet 5m, and endup with 10m, put 7.5m in the bank and try and use your 2.5m wisely, if you lose it then so what, you still walked out with 2.5m, and then be done for the day.

Thanks for the tip, when I get some money back up ill use that strategy

Read full topic
